content.raw:
So like, you would pass both the OBJ file URI and the OBJ file's contents, right? For example:

~~~
loadMeshFromString('assets/XXX.obj', undefined, undefined, function(mesh){}, 
    ['# 3ds Max Wavefront OBJ Exporter v0.97b - (c)2007 guruware
    # File Created: 30.11.2016 17:17:21
    mtllib mesh.mtl
    #
    # object Walkway_45_Right
    #
    v  -762.0001 1077.6306 -0.1269
    ..........
    ']);
~~~

In this case, I'd assume whatever I passed to `files` will be loaded. So I'm not sure why the code would ever go read `assets/XXX.obj`.
